metadata.titleEn: WATER: Dataset of airborne WiDAS mission in the Zhangye-Yingke-Huazhaizi flight zone on Jul. 7, 2008
metadata.titleCn: 黑河综合遥感联合试验：张掖-盈科-花寨子飞行区机载WiDAS数据集（2008年7月7日）
metadata.description:
The dataset of airborne WiDAS mission was obtained in the Zhangye-Yingke-Huazhaizi flight zone on Jul. 7, 2008.
     Intra-band data available for general users include Level-2C data (after geometric, radiometric and atmospheric corrections), Level-1B browse image (after intra-band matching) and Level-2B browse image (after registration). The raw data, Level-1A, and data processing parameters were filed; applications would be evaluated prior to access. Data processing started in Aug. 2008 and ended in Apr. 2009, and in Nov. 2009, CCD data were reprocessed to adjust radiometric calibration. 
     The flying time of each route was as follows:

{|
! id
! flight
! relative height
! starttime
! endtime
! data size
! data state
! data quality
! ground targets 
|-
| 1 || 3#15 || 1500m || 11:00:55 || 11:09:55  ||133 || processed; complete || good	
|-
| 2 || 3#13 || 1500m || 11:14:40 || 11:23:45  || 136 || processed; complete || good
|-
| 3 || 3#11 || 1500m || 11:27:35 || 11:36:45  || 137 || processed; complete || good || the resort, Yingke weather station maize field and Yingke wheat field
|-
| 4 || 3#9 || 1500m || 11:40:55 || 11:50:20 || 137 || incomplete || incomplete || the wetland park, Zhangye city,Yingke weather station maize field, Yingke wheat field and Huazhaizi desert maize field
|-
| 5 || 3#9a || 1500m || 11:53:25 || 12:02:40  || 142 || processed; complete || good || the wetland park, Zhangye city,Yingke weather station maize field, Yingke wheat field and Huazhaizi desert maize field
|-
| 6 || 3#7 || 1500m || 12:07:10 || 12:16:35 || 119 || processed; complete || good
|-   
| 7 || 3#5 || 1500m || 12:19:05 || 12:28:15 || 137 || processed; complete || good || Huazhaizi desert plot 1
|- 
| 8 || 3#3 || 1500m || 12:32:35 || 12:41:50 || 115 || processed; complete || good || Huazhaizi desert plot 2
|- 
| 9 || 3#1 || 1500m || 12:45:25 || 12:54:40 || 139 || processed; complete || good 
|-   
| 10 || 3#z1 || 1500m || 13:03:55 || 13:08:00  || 61 || processed; complete || good 
|-   
| 11 || 3#z2 || 1500m || 13:10:50 || 13:14:45  || 59 || processed; complete
|}
metadata.descriptionCn:
本数据集为机载WiDAS传感器于2008年07月07日获取，地点在张掖-盈科-花寨子飞行区。
原始数据经过几何校正、辐射定标和大气校正后发布，面向普通用户的数据产品为Level-2C产品（经过几何校正、辐射定标和大气校正），以及Level-1B（波段间配准）快视图和Level-2B（波段间配准）快视图。
原始数据（Level-1A数据）和数据处理参数存档，需提交申请并通过审批后才能获得。数据处理时间为2008年8月-2009年4月，完成时间为2009年4月，2009年11月做了一次CCD相机辐射定标的订正。
本数据集的原始数据包括11条航线，其中“3#9”航线数据获取不完整，重飞为“3#9a”。
各航线的飞行时间如下表：
{|
! 序号
! 航线名称
! 相对航高
! 开始时间
! 结束时间
! 数据量（景）
! 数据状态
! 数据质量
! 主要地面目标 
|-
| 1 || 3#15 || 约1500米 || 11:00:55 || 11:09:55  ||133 || 完整，已处理 || 好	
|-
| 2 || 3#13 || 约1500米 || 11:14:40 || 11:23:45  || 136 || 完整，已处理 || 好
|-
| 3 || 3#11 || 约1500米 || 11:27:35 || 11:36:45  || 137 || 完整，已处理 || 好 || 度假村，  盈科气象站玉米地，盈科小麦样方
|-
| 4 || 3#9 || 约1500米 || 11:40:55 || 11:50:20 || 137 || 原始数据不完整，未处理 || 部分数据缺失或缺少波段 || 湿地公园，张掖市区，盈科气象站玉米地，盈科小麦样方，花寨子荒漠玉米样方
|-
| 5 || 3#9a || 约1500米 || 11:53:25 || 12:02:40  || 142 || 完整，已处理 || 好 || 湿地公园，张掖市区，盈科气象站玉米地，盈科小麦样方，花寨子荒漠玉米样方
|-
| 6 || 3#7 || 约1500米 || 12:07:10 || 12:16:35 || 119 || 完整，已处理 || 好
|-   
| 7 || 3#5 || 约1500米 || 12:19:05 || 12:28:15 || 137 || 完整，已处理 || 好 || 花寨子荒漠样方1
|- 
| 8 || 3#3 || 约1500米 || 12:32:35 || 12:41:50 || 115 || 完整，已处理 || 好 || 花寨子荒漠样方2
|- 
| 9 || 3#1 || 约1500米 || 12:45:25 || 12:54:40 || 139 || 完整，已处理 || 好 
|-   
| 10 || 3#z1 || 约1500米 || 13:03:55 || 13:08:00  || 61 || 完整，已处理 || 好 
|-   
| 11 || 3#z2 || 约1500米 || 13:10:50 || 13:14:45  || 59 || 完整，已处理好
|}

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the features and specifications of data collection methods using airborne WiDAS sensors?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 使用空中WiDAS传感器的数据收集方法的特点和规格是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: 1500 meters altitude, geometric correction, radiometric calibration, atmospheric correction, Level-2C products, 11 flight lines, incomplete '3#9' line, re-flight '3#9a', different flight times, different data volumes, specific ground targets, data processing from August 2008 to April 2009, CCD camera radiometric calibration correction in November 2009
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 1500米海拔，高几何校正，辐射校正，大气校正，Level-2C产品，11条飞行航线，不完整的“3#9”航线，重飞“3#9a”，不同的飞行时间，不同的数据量，特定地面目标，数据处理从2008年8月到2009年4月，CCD相机辐射校正在2009年11月进行。

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the total number of flight paths included in a dataset collected by an airborne WiDAS sensor?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 由空中WiDAS传感器收集的数据集中包含的航线总数是多少？

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the need for data correction and calibration in airborne sensor datasets, and how might these impact data quality and completeness?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 影响航空传感器数据集需要数据校正和校准的因素有哪些，这些因素可能如何影响数据质量和完整性？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Data correction and calibration are necessary due to various factors such as geometric distortions, atmospheric conditions, and sensor-specific issues. In the dataset, the original data underwent geometric correction, radiation calibration, and atmospheric correction to ensure accuracy and usability. For example, the CCD camera's radiation calibration was corrected in November 2009 to improve data quality. Additionally, incomplete data acquisition, as seen in flight line '3#9', required a reflight ('3#9a') to achieve a complete dataset. Such corrections and calibrations are critical for maintaining data quality and completeness, especially when original data are incomplete or have missing bands.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 数据修正和校准是必要的，原因包括几何畸变、大气条件和传感器特定问题。在数据集中，原始数据经过几何校正、辐射校准和大气校正，以确保准确性和可用性。例如，CCD相机的辐射校准在2009年11月进行了修正，以提高数据质量。此外，正如在航线“3#9”中所见，数据采集不完整，需要重新飞行（“3#9a”）以获得完整的数据集。这些修正和校准对于维护数据质量和完整性至关重要，尤其是在原始数据不完整或缺少波段的情况下。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential outcomes on data quality when multiple data collection methods are employed, especially considering geometric correction and radiometric calibration?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 当采用多种数据收集方法时，数据质量的潜在结果是什么，特别是考虑到几何校正和辐射校准？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Employing multiple data collection methods, especially those involving geometric correction and radiometric calibration, can significantly enhance the data quality by ensuring that the data is accurately aligned and calibrated for atmospheric conditions. This results in more reliable Level-2C products, which are crucial for end-user applications. Additionally, it allows for the correction of initial data inaccuracies, as evidenced by the correction done in November 2009 for CCD camera calibration.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 采用多种数据收集方法，特别是涉及几何校正和辐射校准的方法，可以显著提高数据质量，确保数据在大气条件下的准确对齐和校准。这导致了更可靠的Level-2C产品，这对最终用户应用至关重要。此外，它还允许纠正初始数据的不准确性，正如2009年11月对CCD相机校准所做的修正所证明的那样。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary goal of collecting airborne WiDAS sensor data over the Zhangye-Yingke-Huazhaizi flight area?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集张掖-营口-华扎子飞行区域的空中WiDAS传感器数据的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary goal of collecting airborne WiDAS sensor data over the Zhangye-Yingke-Huazhaizi flight area is to obtain geometrically corrected, radiometrically calibrated, and atmospherically corrected data products for use by general users, as well as to archive original data and processing parameters for more advanced research purposes. This enables comprehensive remote sensing experiments and supports various applications, such as monitoring agricultural fields, assessing land cover, and conducting environmental studies in the region.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 收集张掖-营口-华扎子飞行区域的机载WiDAS传感器数据的主要目标是获取几何校正、辐射校正和大气校正的数据产品，以供一般用户使用，同时归档原始数据和处理参数，以便进行更高级的研究。这使得全面的遥感实验成为可能，并支持该地区的各种应用，如监测农业用地、评估土地覆盖和进行环境研究。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the specific steps involved in processing airborne WiDAS sensor data to achieve Level-2C products, and what challenges might arise during this data processing?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 处理机载WiDAS传感器数据以获得Level-2C产品涉及哪些具体步骤，在数据处理过程中可能会出现哪些挑战？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The processing of airborne WiDAS sensor data to achieve Level-2C products involves several steps: geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction. The original data undergoes these processing steps to ensure accuracy and usability for general users. Challenges that might arise during this data processing include handling incomplete original data, such as in the case of flight line '3#9', which required a re-flight ('3#9a') due to incomplete data acquisition. Additionally, ensuring accurate calibration, such as the correction made in November 2009 for CCD camera radiometric calibration, is crucial to maintain data quality.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 处理空气WiDAS传感器数据以实现Level-2C产品涉及几个步骤：几何校正、辐射校准和大气校正。原始数据经过这些处理步骤，以确保对一般用户的准确性和可用性。在数据处理过程中可能会遇到的挑战包括处理不完整的原始数据，例如在航线'3#9'的情况下，由于数据采集不完整，需要重新飞行('3#9a')。此外，确保准确的校准，例如在2009年11月对CCD相机进行的辐射校准修正，对于维护数据质量至关重要。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological advancements or processing techniques enable the geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction of remote sensing data to produce enhanced data products?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术进步或处理技术能够实现遥感数据的几何校正、辐射校正和大气校正，以生成增强的数据产品？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction are essential processing techniques applied to original remote sensing data. These processes are crucial for transforming raw data into Level-2C products, which are suitable for general user consumption. The advancements in these techniques enable the accurate representation of spatial, spectral, and temporal features of the data collected by sensors such as the WiDAS sensor used in the research field.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 几何校正、辐射定标和大气校正是应用于原始遥感数据的重要处理技术。这些过程对于将原始数据转化为适合一般用户使用的Level-2C产品至关重要。这些技术的进步使得能够准确表示由传感器（如在研究领域使用的WiDAS传感器）收集的数据的空间、光谱和时间特征。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore the data correction and calibration methods used to ensure data quality in a dataset involving airborne sensors, focusing on geometric correction, radiation calibration, and atmospheric correction.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨用于确保涉及空中传感器的数据集数据质量的数据修正和校准方法，重点关注几何校正、辐射校准和大气校正。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The dataset involves data from an airborne WiDAS sensor, which underwent geometric correction, radiation calibration, and atmospheric correction to ensure data quality. The data products are Level-2C, which have been fully corrected for geometry, radiation, and atmospheric effects. Additionally, the original data required radiation calibration correction done in November 2009, reflecting the ongoing efforts to maintain accuracy. The raw data also include processing parameters archived, accessible upon application approval.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 该数据集涉及来自空中WiDAS传感器的数据，该传感器经过几何校正、辐射校准和大气校正，以确保数据质量。数据产品为Level-2C，已完全校正几何、辐射和大气效应。此外，原始数据还需要在2009年11月进行辐射校准修正，反映了持续维护准确性的努力。原始数据还包括归档的处理参数，需申请批准后方可访问。
